body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

Beginning with commit fef05621a77ee8b62b318370e1ec7bf39502eb7c, Spack passes options to the CMake bootstrap script. The CMake bootstrap script does not accept the given options if CMake releases before 3.12 are used. (I did not test all releases but builds for versions 3.7.2, 3.8.2, and 3.11.4 fail.)
```console
$ which spack
/home/christoph/spack/bin/spack
$ git -C ~/spack rev-parse HEAD
fef05621a77ee8b62b318370e1ec7bf39502eb7c
$ spack install cmake@3.7.2
==> Warning: Missing a source id for ncurses@6.2.20200212
[+] / (external ncurses-6.2.20200212-ujc234wnddrjvgfwk6koel3aqgamiqmz)
[+] /usr (external openssl-1.1.1f-i44um4uum2yiy4jeqsjgqttev27y2fhk)
==> Installing cmake-3.7.2-hd4q5nm7k26z5qd6pusmki63acx6b2ft
==> No binary for cmake-3.7.2-hd4q5nm7k26z5qd6pusmki63acx6b2ft found: installing from source
==> Warning: Missing a source id for ncurses@6.2.20200212
==> Using cached archive: /home/christoph/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/dc/dc1246c4e6d168ea4d6e042cfba577c1acd65feea27e56f5ff37df920c30cae0.tar.gz
==> Applied patch /home/christoph/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/cmake/nag-response-files.patch
==> Applied patch /home/christoph/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/cmake/ignore_crayxc_warnings.patch
==> cmake: Executing phase: 'bootstrap'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    './bootstrap' 'CFLAGS=-O3' 'CXXFLAGS=-O3' '--prefix=/home/christoph/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-sandybridge/gcc-9.3.0/cmake-3.7.2-hd4q5nm7k26z5qd6pusmki63acx6b2ft' '--parallel=4' '--no-system-libs' '--no-qt-gui' '--' '-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release' '-DCMake_TEST_INSTALL=OFF' '-DCMAKE_USE_OPENSSL=True'
See build log for details:
  /tmp/christoph/spack-stage/spack-stage-cmake-3.7.2-hd4q5nm7k26z5qd6pusmki63acx6b2ft/spack-build-out.txt
$ cat /tmp/christoph/spack-stage/spack-stage-cmake-3.7.2-hd4q5nm7k26z5qd6pusmki63acx6b2ft/spack-build-out.txt 
==> cmake: Executing phase: 'bootstrap'
==> [2021-06-05-17:35:19.714530] './bootstrap' 'CFLAGS=-O3' 'CXXFLAGS=-O3' '--prefix=/home/christoph/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu20.04-sandybridge/gcc-9.3.0/cmake-3.7.2-hd4q5nm7k26z5qd6pusmki63acx6b2ft' '--parallel=4' '--no-system-libs' '--no-qt-gui' '--' '-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release' '-DCMake_TEST_INSTALL=OFF' '-DCMAKE_USE_OPENSSL=True'
Unknown option: CFLAGS=-O3
```
@chuckatkins

title: Installation issue: fef05621a breaks cmake < 3.12
